name: Y2K Webs
description:
Founded in 1998, Y2K Webs is one of the most successful and experienced companies in Spain (Barcelona), Costa Rica and Argentina. Our projects have been awarded and recognized for their innovation.
At Y2K Webs we have the tools to make your Internet venture a success. We make available all our computing resources, covering practically every aspect of the communication, image, and need of the company. The strength of Y2K Webs is well established in the construction of innovative Web sites. We have stood out for the quality of the innovation of our services.
